letters.description: Evaluate the maternal-infant bonding cues and identify any attachment challenges.
Guide the client in establishing healthy routines for sleep, nutrition, and gentle exercise.
Address emotional and physical recovery barriers, such as pain, fatigue, or mood changes.
Facilitate open dialogue about expectations, boundaries, and support systems with partners and family.
Cultivate self-compassion and present-moment awareness to enhance maternal well-being and resilience.
